description:
The Zemurian continent`s largest jaeger corps, the Northern Jaegers, are guarding relief supplies headed to Haliask, North Ambria, when they spot a village being attacked by monsters. Lavian, a petite, quiet jaeger defies orders to help the villagers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Appears He... the Hero in Twilight
Au déclin du jour vient le héros du crépuscule
誰そ彼は...... 黄昏の英雄
